review_data.title: Halal food in Zurich.
review_data.content: Another best Turkish restaurant pure halal and no alcohol in the shop. Variety of Turkish food. Very tasty. This hotel has super store as well. The location was changed as mention in the Zabiah application. One of Algerian taxi driver took us to there. It...More

review_data.title: Authentic Turkish food, extremely delicious
review_data.content: It is a must visit for us at least once a month. My kids really love the food there. The staff is extremely helpful and friendly. Their mixed grill and adana kabab are my favorite. My kids love the nuggets & grill stuff. The food...More

review_data.title: Great halal meat selection
review_data.content: I am so relieved to find this place! They are open daily from 10 am to 10 pm. Which is great for those of us who are busy, and there is a a kebab place next to it that is open till 10pm daily!

review_data.title: Dinner
review_data.content: It is a nice small restaurant that also offers take-away. Staff is friendly and the food is served promptly. The prices are moderate for Zürich. Meet is freshly grilled. Has also tasty vegeterian food.

review_data.title: Einfach, authentisch und frisch zubereitet - empfehlenswert

review_data.title: Like a reliable friend.
review_data.content: With so many choices of kebab in the area...its hard to know which are better. Ege is better. As the restaurant is supplied with its own meat and bakery...its as fresh as you can hope for. We make every effort to take out town guests...More

review_data.title: Super Kebab, friendly staff 👍👍
review_data.content: Have been there many times, for a Ege Dürüm. The prices are really fair, and the meat always tasty. When eating there, ask for a chai (tea).
